title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - 'Sharp or Square' AFC/NFC Championship Picks, 'Fake Q's, Real Answers" on Sean Payton, Rodgers, Big Ben
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - 'Sharp or Square' AFC/NFC Championship Picks, 'Fake Q's, Real Answers" on Sean Payton, Rodgers, Big Ben
description:
Colin does "Fake Questions, Real Interviews" on the head coaches who are strangely not getting interviews, why Sean Payton got burnt out, the coaching trend he's keeping his eye on, what Aaron Rodgers got wrong about football culture, and how Big Ben reminds him of a famous (and somewhat infamous) actor. Then, the Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his AFC/NFC Championship picks - Bengals/Chiefs (14:00) and 49ers/Rams (24:00) - are "Sharp or Square", and they discuss the rough end to Aaron Rodgers' season (30:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
